subsection.name: What is the External Resource Project?
subsection.p: An API which enables a developer to manage external resources in Hippo CMS.
We currently only support MediaMosa video platform integration.

subsection.name: Code base on GitHub
subsection.p: The code of this project is on GitHub at https://github.com/bloomreach-forge/external-resources/.
